name: X-Men: Next Dimension
synopsis: Fight in epic superhero showdowns against 24 of your favorite X-Men characters. In X-Men: The Next Dimension, a powerful enemy plots to rid the world of mutants and only the X-Men can stop him. Choose from traditional or new X-Men, each with his or her own special fighting abilities and objects to interact with and battle through destructible environments. Your mission to save the future will uncover secrets about your own past.
